content: the rider s wrap cowl is a beautiful and versatile crochet pattern perfect for beginners crafted with the exquisite urth yarns uneek worsted this cowl showcases the stunning self-striping effect of 100% extrafine superwash merino adding a vibrant and luxurious touch to your accessory collection the rider s wrap cowl is worked in one piece and then sewed up at the end making it an easy and enjoyable project for new crocheters the side saddle stitch creates a chunky textured look that is both cozy and stylish while the uneek worsted yarn provides a breathtaking array of colors you can also choose to crochet this cowl in a solid color for a more classic look we ve also tested this pattern with pianosa an 8ply recycled cotton and party deluxe a sequin thread for a unique twist whether you re looking for a colorful self-striping cowl or a chic solid-color piece the rider s wrap cowl is the perfect addition to your crochet repertoire download the pattern today and create a stunning handmade cowl that will keep you warm and fashionable all season long
